text: This is a list of languages with official status, in India: * Manipuri (Meitei) * Bengali * Marathi * English * Sanskrit * Sindhi * Hindi * Assamese * Punjabi * Odia * Kashmiri * Kannada * Tamil * Telugu *malayalam * Bodo * Santali ==References== * Category:Language-related lists Category:India- related lists
title: Languages with official status in India
